title: Rescued
description: Short story revealing how Griffin first found Saul after moving to Widdershins.Best if read after reading Widdershins as it contains mild spoilers. This story was written to raise funds for Cat Care Initiative, a non-profit based in Campbellford, Ontario. They work tirelessly to find loving forever homes for deserving cats or kittens, and to spay/neuter and provide housing for feral colonies
author: Jordan L. Hawk
